# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9349-102">Organisere din e-post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9349-103">Du kan bruke kommandoer som **Sweep** og **flytte til** å slette eller flytte meldinger fra en bestemt avsender automatisk i Outlook på weben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-103">In Outlook on the web, you can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9349-104">Disse kommandoene vises over meldingslisten når du merker en melding i innboksen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9349-105">**Sweep**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e9349-106">kan du raskt slette meldinger i innboksen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9349-107">Du kan automatisk slette all innkommende e-post fra denne avsenderen, beholder bare de nyeste e-posten og Slett resten eller slette e-post eldre enn 10 dager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9349-108">**Flytte til**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e9349-109">kan du flytte en melding til en bestemt melding til en annen mappe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9349-110">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se [arbeide med meldingsmapper i Outlook på weben](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9349-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
